attributes.action: Only Lockdown Unvaccinated People (unless exempt). Protect our NHS-Saving Lives.
attributes.additional_details: apply lockdown measures to the unvaccinated only...
attributes.background: As consistently reported in the media, the vast majority of people in our hospitals with Covid are unvaccinated. Only Lockdown Unvaccinated People (unless exempt) to protect our NHS and Save lives... Allow are doctors to treat people who need attention; cancer patients etc..

departments.name: Department of Health and Social Care

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about COVID, but we're not sure if you want the Government to implement lockdown measures for people who are not vaccinated against COVID, or to exempt people who are vaccinated from any future lockdowns.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

Also, we couldn't publish a petition that stated that the vast majority of people in hospital with COVID are not vaccinated, as this is no longer true. You can read more about this here: https://fullfact.org/health/economist-vaccination-status/
